activities: Zoho offers a range of services through web based applications available on its website www.zoho.com. Zoho collects holds and processes personal data from users in EU/EEA for different purposes depending on the services provided by Zoho. The personal data collected from the users may be used by Zoho for the following purposes including but not limited to operating and rendering such services to users, selling and marketing such services to users, rendering support services to the users, complying with the orders and directions of governmental enforcement agencies under applicable laws and regulations, and detecting and preventing fraud and other illegal activities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
